On Mon, 10 Jan 2005 at 13:54:39, ricksworld2k wrote:

> Hello All,
> 
> I h=
ave a client and server application that use the JDK 1.4 ORB to
> communica=
te between them. I am interested in the following:
> 
> 1. Easily obtaining=
 implemented CORBA server objects into my client
> for testing, and

It's a=
 heck of a lot easier to use something like easymock.  Do you *really*
need=
 to test against real server objects?  I have found that is only necessary
=
in a small subset of test cases.


> 
> 2. Testing the CORBA server objects=
 in the server itself (and in the
> server's JVM)

That's not really any di=
fferent than a shared fixture that handles the ORB
setup/teardown.
